Html:
Hi.  I am trying to use the 01simple.php example.  This file can be viewed here:

https://github.com/PHPOffice/PHPExcel/tree/develop/Examples

At the very least, I am fully aware of files and their locations such as require_once '../Classes/PHPExcel.php';

All files are where they are supposed to be.  However when I ran the 01simple.php file, I received a warning and a fatal error:

Warning: main(../Classes/PHPExcel.php) [function.main]: failed to open stream: No such file or directory in C:\Surefire_DB\simple.php on line 37

Fatal error: main() [function.require]: Failed opening required '../Classes/PHPExcel.php' (include_path='.;C:\php5\pear') in C:\Surefire_DB\simple.php on line 37


I don't know how to fix these issues.  Please provide solution.  thank you.
